summary:
- More than 20 years of experience in data management with proven talents in directing and managing teams; consulted and provided training for major project implementations; provided technical support to resolve issues. Primary emphasis on timely delivery of cost effective services while maintaining maximum quality.
- Strong engineering background in real-time drilling/logging data management services for the Oil & Gas industry.
- Planned and supervised the implementation and maintenance of systems for real-time data acquisition, transmission, storage and visualization; developed and implemented  real-time engineering analysis; integrated WITSML data with 3rd party applications such as Openworks, Petrel, Geolog, TerraVu, Predict, Well Plan and others, for easy use in Real-Time Operations Centers (RTOC’s).
- Ample knowledge of data standards and transmission protocols like LAS, WITS0, WITSML (xml family) and ETP.
- Experience with the logistics of equipment movements for global operations.
- Educated in English, Spanish and German; in-depth experience with European, Latin-American and Asian Cultures.
- Enjoy working in a multi-cultural environment; have worked in different counties around the world and have always been willing and interested to travel.
- Loyal employee with a focused, analytical mind, able to perform under stress.

Played a leading role in two projects for major national oil companies that both started with the implementation of the WITSML standard;

- Saudi Aramco
Saudi Aramco is a firm supporter of the WITSML data standard. Having all the service companies committing to this standard, made it possible to build a central ORACLE based WITSML data repository containing data from all the wells in Saudi Arabia.

- Pemex
Implementation of the WITSML data standard and of a real-time Operation center (RTOC or CCPTR) for Pemex in Mexico.
PEMEX is currently implementing an ORACLE based WITSML data hub similar to the one implemented in Saudi Aramco.

profile_positions.description: Starting up a new technology center in The Netherlands. In charge of recruiting and building a technical team that will work on innovative projects related to the oil and gas industry and the next generation corporate software. Due to the worldwide crises in the oil industry, the Petrolink group decide to close the Petrolink office in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Utrecht Office Manager / Director

profile_positions.description:
Used my experience with global operations and my ability to communicate in English and Spanish, to Link knowledge and development activities specific to one region, with all the other regions.
The objective;
•	Investigate if products, processes and procedures can be successfully applied elsewhere,
•	Prevent duplicate development efforts between offices, 
•	Improve communications between offices.
profile_positions.title: Link Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Leading the startup of real-time data services for Saudi Aramco’s Geosteering Operations Center (GOC). GOC depends fully on real-time LWD/MWD data to land the well and to geosteer the well into and through the reservoir. 
Startup of real-time data services for unconventional wells (Fracking).
profile_positions.title: Geosteering Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
Managed operations for both real-time and static data in the US, Europe, Africa, Asia and South America.
Operations included;
•	Leading local staff and field engineers,
•	handling logistics for global rig equipment, 
•	Overseeing the installation of equipment on the rig site,
•	The administration and monitoring of the availability and integrity of the data.
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
Leading the startup of real-time data services and a real-time Operations Center (CCPTR) for PEMEX in Mexico. 
- Training local staff in the administration of real-time drilling and logging data.
- Providing technical support for the real-time Operations Center.
profile_positions.title: Technical Manager

profile_positions.description:
Played a major role in Petrolink starting up and expanding Operations in Saudi Arabia. Maintained the contacts with Saudi Aramco and service companies like Schlumberger, Halliburton and Weatherford. 
After the implementation of the ORACLE based WITSML database solution for Saudi Aramco, the second step was to have all service companies commit to this WITSML standard.
Objectives;
•	One data standard
•	One data hub for all well data
•	One data viewer for all data
We managed to secure the contract to collect, transmit, store and visualize all real-time data from all rigs in Saudi Aramco, meeting stated objectives.
profile_positions.title: Country Manager

profile_positions.description:
As technical director, for the Latin American area, I was in charge of Petrolink’s hardware / software setup and administration. I was maintaining contact with our clients in PlusPetrol and PDVSA.
During this period I was also involved with operations in the USA, Bolivia, Equatorial Guinea and Trinidad & Tobago.
profile_positions.title: Technical Director Latin America

profile_positions.description: Involved with several projects in the Caribbean. Advised and assisted in selling sales automation software in Venezuela and the English speaking islands in the Caribbean. Maintained communication with their sales contacts and technical support abroad.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Directing the seismic data copying center, in charge of the automation and control of the formatting and copying of 2D and 3D seismic data.
Reorganization of the tape storage facility, this included the addition of new storage capacity.
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description:
In charge of setting up and managing the new well log digitizing department in Caracas, Puerto la Cruz and Maracaibo.
Developed a SQL Database to administrate the project of scanning and indexing of "Observer reports" for all oil-wells in Venezuela.
Started up a new project that involved indexing and scanning of 50.000 electrical maps for the company "Electricidad de Caracas" (EDC), and the development of a SQL Database for the indexed data.
profile_positions.title: Project Leader

profile_positions.description:
Technical research at the Faculty of Electrical Engineering, department of "Power System Engineering".
Project leader; Design of a high voltage / frequency transformer for new lighting systems ("Gas Discharge Lamps"), using "Finite Elements Modeling". The project was realized working closely together with "Philips Lighting".
profile_positions.title: Scientific Researcher
